statements: SELECT * FROM temperature_storage WHERE location = 'Room A';
SELECT medication_name, temperature FROM temperature_storage WHERE humidity > 70;
SELECT * FROM temperature_storage WHERE temperature < 2.0 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT medication_name, humidity FROM temperature_storage WHERE temperature BETWEEN 5.0 AND 8.0;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS count FROM temperature_storage GROUP BY location HAVING count > 1;
SELECT * FROM temperature_storage WHERE medication_name = 'Paracetamol'
SELECT medication_name, temperature FROM temperature_storage ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM temperature_storage
SELECT * FROM temperature_storage WHERE humidity > 50 AND location = 'Room A'
SELECT medication_name, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM temperature_storage GROUP BY medication_name
SELECT * FROM Medication;
SELECT medication_name, storage_temperature FROM Medication;
SELECT * FROM Temperature_Log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Medication WHERE storage_temperature > 25;
SELECT medication_name FROM Medication WHERE storage_temperature < 10;
SELECT * FROM Medication
SELECT medication_id, medication_name FROM Medication ORDER BY medication_name DESC
SELECT * FROM Temperature_Log WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT medication_name, AVG(temperature) FROM Medication JOIN Temperature_Log ON Medication.medication_id = Temperature_Log.medication_id GROUP BY medication_name HAVING AVG(temperature) > 20
SELECT medication_id, medication_name, storage_temperature FROM Medication WHERE storage_temperature BETWEEN 2.0 AND 8.0
SELECT * FROM temperature_logs
SELECT medication_name, quantity FROM medication_inventory ORDER BY medication_name ASC
SELECT * FROM medication_inventory WHERE storage_location = 'Refrigerator' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC
SELECT temperature, timestamp FROM temperature_logs WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT medication_name, min_temperature, max_temperature FROM temperature_thresholds
SELECT log_id, temperature, timestamp FROM temperature_logs WHERE temperature > 25.0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM medication_inventory WHERE quantity < 50 AND expiration_date > NOW();
SELECT medication_name, quantity, storage_location FROM medication_inventory WHERE storage_location='Fridge' ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT threshold_id, medication_name, min_temperature, max_temperature FROM temperature_thresholds WHERE min_temperature < 10.0 AND max_temperature > 30.0;
SELECT * FROM temperature_logs WHERE TIMESTAMP BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY log_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM medication_storage;
SELECT medication_name, expiration_date FROM medication_storage WHERE temperature_celsius > 20;
SELECT location_name, temperature_min, temperature_max FROM storage_location;
SELECT shipment_date, temperature_celsius FROM shipment ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT medication_id, entry_time, exit_time FROM medication_tracking WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM medication_storage
SELECT * FROM storage_location ORDER BY location_name DESC
SELECT id, medication_name FROM medication_storage WHERE temperature_celsius > 25
SELECT * FROM shipment WHERE temperature_celsius BETWEEN 2.5 AND 7.5
SELECT medication_name, expiration_date FROM medication_storage JOIN medication_tracking ON medication_storage.id = medication_tracking.medication_id
SELECT * FROM TemperatureSensor;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM TemperatureSensor WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM Medication ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM StorageUnit WHERE location LIKE '%Warehouse%';
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM TemperatureLog ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM TemperatureSensor WHERE status = TRUE ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT name, storage_temperature FROM Medication WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' AND storage_temperature < 25.0 ORDER BY storage_temperature;
SELECT location, capacity FROM StorageUnit WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT log_id, sensor_id, temperature, timestamp FROM TemperatureLog WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT alert_id, message, alert_time FROM Alert WHERE alert_time >= '2022-02-15 12:00:00' AND alert_time < '2022-02-16 12:00:00';
